ai-patthana16.42:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.42:1.1_1: present cause, without reason, the teaching, or the condition for the sake of all these things.
ai-patthana16.42:1.1_2: This is the cause, this is the reason why, not for the sake of the future, or for the sake of all these days.
ai-patthana16.42:1.1_3: In brief, there are three grounds for the objects of conditions: three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, or a hundred thousand objects.
ai-patthana16.42:1.1_5: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
